column4: Can someone please help me, I'm getting worried. I'm running Karmic Koala and my speakers won't work at all, even after three reboots.
I don't know how it would be muted, Random832.
I'll run alsamixer and see, but I think they look fine.
in terminal, type alsamixer -c0, raise and unmute the proper levels, and then press escape to exit, then type alsactl store
